text: Aldo Bergolli (1916 - 1972) was an Italian painterLombardia Beni Culturali, entry for Paesaggio con Alberi (1967). of the Corrente de Vita movement started in Milan as a counterpoint to nationalistic Futurism and the Novecento Italiano movements. He painted both expressionist figurative works, but later focused on more hieroglyphic abstract themes. ==References== Category:1916 births Category:1972 deaths Category:Brera Academy alumni Category:20th- century Italian painters Category:Italian male painters
